title: Error 004 Patching Issue
body:
For the past week I haven't been able to play because I get the "Error 004" every time I am trying to patch. I have followed ALL of the steps from the permissions guide that is constantly linked as a fix to this... Nothing has worked. I reinstalled multiple times (even though I know that shouldn't be the reason it wont work).

Is there any way to run the patch through the legacy client? Has anyone else found a way to fix this error for themselves?
Just want to play... thanks

replies.body: Sorry to hear you've been dealing with this for a week now.  :(  Since the permissions guide didn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out individually.  Grab the logs provided by the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well and attach it for more context.  We'll see you here and get you fixed up!
I'm waiting for my ticket to be answered - is there any way I can patch through the legacy client or is it gone and I have to use the new client for patching?
